CreateSoftwareConfiguration.name: CreateSoftwareConfiguration
CreateSoftwareConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a software configuration

CreateSubscription.name: CreateSubscription
CreateSubscription.description: Grants permission to create a subscription for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

DeleteSoftwareConfiguration.name: DeleteSoftwareConfiguration
DeleteSoftwareConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete the software configuration

DescribeHardwarePlatform.name: DescribeHardwarePlatform
DescribeHardwarePlatform.description: Grants permission to describe the hardware platform

DescribeSoftwareConfiguration.name: DescribeSoftwareConfiguration
DescribeSoftwareConfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the software configuration

DescribeSubscription.name: DescribeSubscription
DescribeSubscription.description: Grants permission to describes the subscription for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

GetEmpPatchUrl.name: GetEmpPatchUrl
GetEmpPatchUrl.description: Grants permission to get URL for sotware patch-release, patch-diff and release notes under FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

GetSoftwareURL.name: GetSoftwareURL
GetSoftwareURL.description: Grants permission to get the URL for Amazon FreeRTOS software download

GetSoftwareURLForConfiguration.name: GetSoftwareURLForConfiguration
GetSoftwareURLForConfiguration.description: Grants permission to get the URL for Amazon FreeRTOS software download based on the configuration

GetSubscriptionBillingAmount.name: GetSubscriptionBillingAmount
GetSubscriptionBillingAmount.description: Grants permission to fetch the subscription billing amount for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

ListFreeRTOSVersions.name: ListFreeRTOSVersions
ListFreeRTOSVersions.description: Grants permission to lists versions of AmazonFreeRTOS

ListHardwarePlatforms.name: ListHardwarePlatforms
ListHardwarePlatforms.description: Grants permission to list the hardware platforms

ListHardwareVendors.name: ListHardwareVendors
ListHardwareVendors.description: Grants permission to list the hardware vendors

ListSoftwareConfigurations.name: ListSoftwareConfigurations
ListSoftwareConfigurations.description: Grants permission to lists the software configurations

ListSoftwarePatches.name: ListSoftwarePatches
ListSoftwarePatches.description: Grants permission to list software patches of subscription for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

ListSubscriptionEmails.name: ListSubscriptionEmails
ListSubscriptionEmails.description: Grants permission to list the subscription emails for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

ListSubscriptions.name: ListSubscriptions
ListSubscriptions.description: Grants permission to list the subscriptions for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

UpdateEmailRecipients.name: UpdateEmailRecipients
UpdateEmailRecipients.description: Grants permission to update list of subscription email address for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

UpdateSoftwareConfiguration.name: UpdateSoftwareConfiguration
UpdateSoftwareConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the software configuration

VerifyEmail.name: VerifyEmail
VerifyEmail.description: Grants permission to verify the email for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)
